dcterms:creator: Y. Kang
R. Zhang
W. Shao
F. D. Salim
J. Chan
dcterms:description: A publicly available taxi trip dataset collected in New York City, containing essential information on all requests executed by active taxis including the day and time when a request is raised, the location where the request is raised, and the drop-off location it required.
dcterms:title: New York City Taxi dataset
